newsitem.title: USA: IXC files for two millon common shr offer.
newsitem.headline: IXC files for two millon common shr offer.

text.p: IXC Communications Inc said Wednesday it filed a registration with the Securities and Exchange Commission to sell up to two million common shares.

The underwriters have been granted a 30-day over-allotment option to buy up to 300,000 additional common shares. The offering will be made through Morgan Stanley & Co Inc, Credit Suisse First Boston and Dillon Read & Co Inc.
After the offering, outstanding shares will total 32,795,014 common.
Net proceeds will be used for capital expenditures, including the fiber expansion, the company said.
IXC, based in Austin, Texas, provides two principal services to long distance companies: long-haul transmission of voice and data over dedicated circuits and switched long distance services.
